FeatureType.name: rnd
FeatureType.description: Random number for selecting random subsets

AttributeType.name: mean
AttributeType.description: Mean value of valid feature pixels

AttributeType.name: stdev
AttributeType.description: Standard deviation of valid feature pixels

AttributeType.name: cvar
AttributeType.description: Coefficient of variation of valid feature pixels

AttributeType.name: min
AttributeType.description: Minimim value of valid feature pixels

AttributeType.name: max
AttributeType.description: Maximum value of valid feature pixels

AttributeType.name: p10
AttributeType.description: The threshold such that 10% of the sample values are below the threshold

AttributeType.name: p50
AttributeType.description: The threshold such that 50% of the sample values are below the threshold (=median)

AttributeType.name: p90
AttributeType.description: The threshold such that 90% of the sample values are below the threshold

AttributeType.name: skewness
AttributeType.description: A measure of the extent to which the histogram "leans" to one side of the mean. The skewness value can be positive or negative, or even undefined.

AttributeType.name: count
AttributeType.description: Sample count (number of valid feature pixels)

FeatureType.name: speckle_divergence.largestConnectedBlob
FeatureType.description: Largest connected cluster size as a percent of patch
